front.title: A Network Virtualization Overlay Solution using EVPN

abstract.t: This document describes how Ethernet VPN (EVPN) [RFC7432] can be used as an Network Virtualization Overlay (NVO) solution and explores the various tunnel encapsulation options over IP and their impact on the EVPN control-plane and procedures. In particular, the following encapsulation options are analyzed: VXLAN, NVGRE, and MPLS over GRE.
